name: MEN'S ROCKPORT RIDGEFIELD EUREKA CASUAL OXFORDS

description.text: The Ridgefield Eureka combines the comfort of a walking shoe with the look of an everyday casual-so you never have to compromise. With San Crispino construction for heel stability, generous collar and tongue padding, removable footbed, and a Strobel construction build for forefoot flexibility.
list: Lace-up closure for a custom and secure fit
Patented San Crispino heel for superior heel support
Padded tongue and collar for added comfort

name: MEN'S BROOKS TRACE 2 RUNNING SHOES

description.text: The Trace 2 is built with dynamic cushioning that responds to your body and reduces impact. You also have a breathable fit and smooth transitions, which means less on your mind as you’re going the distance.

name: MEN'S BIRKENSTOCK ARIZONA FOOTBED SANDALS

description.text: Men's Birkenstock Two-Strap Cork Sandals. From the brand that is known for creating and perfecting a tradition of walking comfort we present the Birkenstock Arizona! These slip-on sandals feature dual adjustable straps at the vamp for a secure fit. The original Birkenstock footbed offers arch support, a deep heel cup, and a roomy toe box so you and your feet can kick back and enjoy the day!
list: Flexible, lightweight, shock absorbing EVA traction outsole
Original Birkenstock footbed features arch support, deep heel cup, and roomy toe box
Fully adjustable dual straps at vamp
Please note - Medium width is listed as Regular width on Birkenstock box

name: WOMEN'S LIFESTRIDE SUNSET PUMPS

description.text: The LifeStride Sunset Pumps offer more than just elegance – they offer a lifestyle of sophistication, comfort, and versatility. With their timeless design, cutting-edge comfort technology, and impeccable craftsmanship, these pumps become a reliable part of your daily routine. Elevate your style, embrace all-day comfort, and step confidently into any setting with the LifeStride Sunset Pumps by your side.
list: Cushioned insoles provide a luxurious feel
Impeccable attention to detail ensures durability and longevity

name: WOMEN'S CONVERSE CHUCK TAYLOR ALL STAR LIFT HI HIGH-TOP PLATFORM SNEAKERS

description.text: The Converse Lift Hi Platform sneaker offers a stylish twist on the classic Chuck Taylor design with a trendy, elevated platform sole. These sneakers feature a durable canvas upper, lace-up closure for a secure fit, and iconic Converse branding on the tongue and heel. The platform sole adds extra height and cushioning for a comfortable and bold look. With their versatile design, the Converse Lift Hi Platform sneakers can easily be dressed up or down for any occasion

name: GIRLS' MAKALU LITTLE KID & BIG KID COZY LAND BOOTS

description.text: For cute and cozy winter style, give her the Makalu Cozy Land faux fur boot. She'll be the cutest little snow angel with these slip on boots featuring plush faux fur shaft, sweet bow and pom-pom accents, and an easy on and off design.

name: KIDS' CROCS TODDLER CLASSIC SOLARIZED CLOGS

The solarized design adds a playful and colorful touch, making these clogs a standout choice for various activities.

description.text: Your little one will feel like a total all-star on and off the court with their new Nike Court Borough Mid 2 Sneakers! These classic high-top sneaks have everything little feet need to feel comfortable and to play hard like a durable upper, soft padding in the collar, and a durable traction outsole that will enable your little all-star to play all day.

description.text: With Bearpaw's Brock hiking boot, you can tackle the terrain with comfort and ease. Protected with NeverWet®, the Brock will stay dry, while the memory foam insole, compression EVA midsole, and the durable rubber outsole provides you total comfort with every step.

name: MEN'S ITASCA SONOMA ICE HOUSE II WINTER BOOTS

description.text: Men's Itasca Ice House Winter Boots. Gear up for the snowy season with the updated Itasca Ice House II boots! Designed to keep your feet warm and dry, these rugged winter boots combine a rubber traction outsole, genuine suede uppers, and 3M Thinsulate™ Insulation lining for warmth. From braving blizzards to playing in the snow with the kids, the Itasca Ice House II will keep your feet comfy and cozy all winter long!
list: Lugged rubber outsole for excellent traction
Lace-up front with metal d-rings for a secure fit
Removable fleece insole for added warmth
Pull tab at the heel for easy pull on
3M Thinsulate™ Insulation lining for thin insulation

A smooth synthetic upper combines with stitching details for well put together style, while the cushioned footbed and soft suede lining are sure to keep you comfortable. From date night to the boardroom, you'll be confident in the Freeman Henson Slip On!

name: WOMEN'S JOURNEE COLLECTION KYLLIE KNEE HIGH BOOTS

description.text: The Kyllie boot is extravagant and perfect for your fall and winter events. This boot features a soft faux suede material, an almond toe, and a tall chunky heel. The inside zipper helps with ease of access, and the knee-high design is slimming and fitted. The unique decorate detail on the outside of the boot creates a beautiful refreshing design.

name: GIRLS' VINTAGE HAVANA KALLY 13-6

description.text: Introducing the Vintage Havana Grande Slip-On Sneaker, where style and comfort unite in perfect harmony. These sneakers are a trendy and effortless choice for those seeking a fashionable yet laid-back look. Crafted with high-quality materials, these slip-on sneakers offer both durability and comfort, making them a reliable choice for everyday wear.

He'll love the look and feel of soft canvas uppers, cushioned footbed for all day comfort, and moc stitched toe front. From khakis to denim, the Nautica Spinnaker 13-6 will be his go to shoe for any occasion!

name: MEN'S VINTAGE FOUNDRY CO REMINGTON BOOTS

description.text: Classics are classics for a reason! Vintage Foundry Co. artisanally crafted the Remington with a timeless construction and reinvented it with a subtle vintage, burnished toe and a touch of texture on a sleek silhouette, giving you confidence in every step.
list: Lace-up closure for a custom and secure fit

name: MEN'S DOCKERS STAFFORD DRESS LOAFERS

description.text: A fresh modern take on a classic fashion necessity, these Dockers loafers are everything you’ve been looking for to elevate your business casual look. These men’s dress shoes are made to easily add a touch of polished class to any outfit from jeans to slacks with their synthetic leather uppers, detailed stitching, and modern, moc-toe design. These loafers are also made to keep your feet relaxed, even on your longest days, with their ultra-cushioned footbed and shock-absorbing, lightweight outsoles. Whether you’re working from home or spending time at the office, these Dockers are sure to be your new favorites thanks to their fresh design and long-lasting comfort.

name: WOMEN'S FILA MEMORY RECKONING 9 SLIP-RESISTANT COMPOSITE TOE WORK SHOES

description.text: Get footwear that works hard to keep you safe and comfortable with the Fila® Memory Reckoning 9 SR CT! These durable composite toe work shoes have a Memory Foam insole with COOLMAX® technology for all season comfort, and a durable slip-resistant rubber outsole for solid traction. The padded tongue and collar provides added protection and comfort. Add the Fila® Memory Reckoning 9 SR CT to your cart today and start working in comfort!
list: Combination upper with breathable mesh and synthetic overlays
Slip-resistant rubber outsole for solid traction
